Class Questions

java.lang.Object
main.Questions
public class Questions extends Object
Questions class manages all question-related operations in the Question and Answer system. This class handles the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of questions, interfacing with the database through DatabaseHelper.

Copyright: Team 60 CSE 360

Version:
1.00 2025-04-01 Questions class implementation

  • Constructor Details

    • Questions

      public Questions(DatabaseHelper2 dbHelper, Connection connection) throws SQLException
      Creates a new Questions manager with database connection.
      Parameters:
      dbHelper - Database helper instance for database operations
      connection - Database connection for direct queries
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database connection fails

      public List<Question> searchQuestions(String keyword) throws SQLException

      Returns:
